headline: Riot Surges On Activist Data Center Proposal, ARK Resumes Coinbase Buys
summary: Activist investor urges Riot Platforms to expedite shift from bitcoin miner to data center play. Cathie Wood, ARK resume buying Coinbase.

raw.headline: Riot Surges On Activist Data Center Proposal, ARK Resumes Coinbase Buys
raw.summary: Activist investor urges Riot Platforms to expedite shift from bitcoin miner to data center play. Cathie Wood, ARK resume buying Coinbase.

headline: Trump Jr. calls banking a 'Ponzi scheme' that forced family to create crypto business
summary: Donald Trump Jr. and Eric Trump are hosting the World Liberty Forum at the Mar-a-Lago club in Palm Beach, Fla., owned by their father, President Donald Trump.

raw.headline: Trump Jr. calls banking a 'Ponzi scheme' that forced family to create crypto business

headline: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong, Sen. Bernie Moreno on the future of crypto regulation
summary: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong and U.S. Senator Bernie Moreno sit down with CNBC's Sara Eisen to discuss the future of crypto regulation, stablecoin policy, and more.

headline: New Strong Sell Stocks for February 18th
summary: COIN, NBIX and UPST have been added to the Zacks Rank #5 (Strong Sell) List on February 18th, 2026.

headline: 2 Cash-Heavy Stocks with Competitive Advantages and 1 Facing Challenges
summary: A surplus of cash can mean financial stability, but it can also indicate a reluctance (or inability) to invest in growth. Some of these companies also face challenges like stagnating revenue, declining market share, or limited scalability.

raw.headline: 2 Cash-Heavy Stocks with Competitive Advantages and 1 Facing Challenges

headline: Whale's Methodology: Investing Through The Lens Of Volatility (II)
summary: Across most asset classes, historical data show a strong association between high volatility and falling prices. Read more here.

headline: Wall Street Unable To Understand Coinbase? Brian Armstrong Says Crypto Platform Is Also Underestimated: 'The Laggards Are Going To Be Left Behind'
summary: Coinbase Global Inc. CEO Brian Armstrong acknowledged on Tuesday, February 17, that the company is "misunderstood" on Wall Street, stating that some traditional finance players have not been able to stomach the cryptocurrency "disruption."

raw.headline: Wall Street Unable To Understand Coinbase? Brian Armstrong Says Crypto Platform Is Also Underestimated: 'The Laggards Are Going To Be Left Behind'
